hows the movie anyone seen it yet

Its dark....I mean many a places it was difficult to understand...especially in the night scenes...I was practically groping on the monitor....People in the hall were coming and going...its a bit awkward for a kingdom release....should give 6/6...The movie is bit thick....no good acting or dialogs..it was all guns and big fires around....By the way, I liked the chic especially in the last scene...
